attributes.additional_details:
We, the people of the United Kingdom are signing this petition to raise awareness and show the government that we want  to be taken   seriously in what we think is this right move for our country. Cannabis may be an illegal drug but in my opinion it is far safer than going to church on Sunday.

In my time I have came across hundreds of people that smoke it, many having different reasons some smoke it for the muscle relaxant benefits due to there old age, some for stress, headaches or any pain, and some because they know what is good for them.

Save our planet by going green, Before it is to late.

http://www.onegreenplanet.org/animalsandnature/4-ways-hemp-can-save-the-world/
http://scienceblog.cancerresearchuk.org/2012/07/25/cannabis-cannabinoids-and-cancer-the-evidence-so-far/
